q: Washington is in many ways a provincial small town, where everyone knows everyone else's business and the truly interesting parts are off-limits to cameras. Almost all good morsels of gossip are off the record. ( Besides Ronald Reagan , Mike Pence 's top political heroes include Republicans Jack Kemp and Dan Quayle .) many unanswered questions about too many important people, companies and institutions...[ This] suggests that David Cameron 's lack of judgment over Andy Coulson is even more striking.'' uncomfortable questions remain for the prime minister. This affair casts serious doubt on the prime minister's judgment. He saw fit to appoint Mr Andy Coulson as the Conservative party's director of communications when the former editor was tarred by association with the phone-hacking scandal. Why would he want such a compromised spokesman? Was he naive enough to believe Mr Andy Coulson 's assurances? Or did he not care about what had taken place? Neither scenario is very comforting. `` I think that Mr Andy Coulson has much more explaining to do. I am amazed that Dave did not think this too, and that he, in the wake of what I know he was advised by

`` Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
